title: Coronavirus in Suifenhe: Remote border town locks down as China opens up
description: As cases rise in Suifenhe - 1,000 miles from Beijing - people have been ordered to stay indoors.
content:
Image copyrightAFP / GettyImage caption
 Suifenhe, where around 100,000 people live, has a road and rail crossing with Russia
A Chinese city on the Russian border is entering a "lockdown" due to an increase in coronavirus cases - even as the rest of China c… [+3326 chars]
